articles.title: Exclusive: Gary Kirsten approached to be new England Test coach after reservations about Justin Langer - The Telegraph
articles.description: Langer no longer candidate because England want to split the coaching roles and doubts over whether he would work well with Ben Stokes
articles.content:
Gary Kirsten has been approached by England to be the new head coach of the Test team. Telegraph Sport also understands that Justin Langer is out of the running for the job.

articles.title: Emma Raducanu can't keep the smile off her face as she takes time off the court after match loss - Daily Mail

articles.title: Jake Paul responds to Tommy Fury after the British boxer called him out - Daily Mail
